item.title: Jennifer add a quote by E.E. Cummings
item.description: "I will take the sun in my mouth and leap into the ripe air Alive with closed eyes to dash against darkness" -- E.E. Cummings

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence on society." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Stefan Zweig
item.description: "Time to leave now, get out of this room, go somewhere, anywhere; sharpen this feeling of happiness and freedom, stretch your limbs, fill your eyes, be awake, wider awake, vividly awake in every sense and every pore." -- Stefan Zweig

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by T.S. Eliot
item.description: "For last year's words belong to last year's language And next year's words await another voice." -- T.S. Eliot

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Susan Sontag
item.description: "My library is an archive of longings." -- Susan Sontag

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by John Green
item.description: "As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once." -- John Green

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "There comes a time when one must take a position that is neither safe, nor politic, nor popular, but he must take it because conscience tells him it is right." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Nadezhda Mandelstam
item.description: "I decided it is better to scream. Silence is the real crime against humanity." -- Nadezhda Mandelstam

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Nikos Kazantzakis
item.description: "I felt once more how simple and frugal a thing is happiness: a glass of wine, a roast chestnut, a wretched little brazier, the sound of the sea. Nothing else." -- Nikos Kazantzakis

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
item.description: "Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad." -- Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Billy Collins
item.description: "You will always be the bread and the knife, not to mention the crystal goblet and—somehow—the wine." -- Billy Collins

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Sharon Olds
item.description: "I was a late bloomer. But anyone who blooms at all, ever, is very lucky. " -- Sharon Olds
